name: BaTemp
description:
You control a Bat who tries to maintain temperatures.

Controls:

  • Z to place Blocks.
  •  X to remove blocks.
  • Arrow keys to move.
  • A & S to change blocks (Bat will change colour depending on which one you pick).

Features:

  •  Balls that change temperature depending on which blocks they hit.
  • 15 unique levels which offer different challenges.
  • See for yourself
